name: Fungi Frolic
description:
Take on a series of enchanting puzzle-platformer challenges, then make your own! Explore a 10-level campaign of increasing difficulty that also teaches you the fun interactions between objects!

Coming soon: the level editor! Make and share your own levels with friends.

Features:
-Bouncy mushroom fun
-Enemies both simple and intelligent
-Lots of goodies to collect
-Puzzle solving with pushable crates, toggle barriers and more!

Link to the game's forum topic
